name: Threshold Development 2
description:
Having a strong threshold is crucial to climbing performance. Whether your goal is to ride as a professional cyclist, or to get fitter, improving your threshold/FTP will help you on your journey. Today we progress on last weeks Threshold Development session, increasing the duration of the intervals and time in the zone!
